item.title: Two Crystal Balls Problem
item.description: This is a famous software engineering interview question from Google. I thought I’d provide my explanation that is borderline pedantic. Let’s solve this problem as naively as possible then again with nothing more than highschool maths. The Problem There are a few different versions of this question. Sometimes it is crystal balls, or eggs or something else. There is a 100 story building. We have two magic glass orbs. The orbs will only break at or above floor X.
